page.title: 06The Shopping Precinct
page.content: In l976/77 Branklodge Securities Limited proposed a shopping precinct with adjoining car-park. The precinct will be positioned off Bath Street in the East Street/Albion Place area. This company obtained planning permission for this development which will include some of the land in possession of the Borough Council. This scheme did not advance until the end of 1984, early 1985 because of the problems obtaining the land. The present owners of Ilkeston's shops on Bath Street have fought a gutsy rearguard action against their businesses. Certain shops such as Burtons have decided to quit Bath Street to be in the centre of the precinct. Burtons will not be a highly fashionable 'Top Man' store, but will be 'much bigger and better' than the present Burtons.
